title: Patcher is very laggy
body: This started happening a few months ago where i would have have to wait for ages after an update to accept both EULA's and launching the game was a massive ordeal of closing the client then re-opening then maybe restarting my laptop ect. until I could finally get into the log in screen. from there the game works fine however just recently I can't even launch the game anymore I tried re-installing a while ago to fix the lag (didn't work but I could still play eventually)I'm In the middle of a reinstall now to see if it fixes the issue. has anyone else had a similar problem?

replies.body: happens to me every patch and i know others it happens to
I re installed. The launcher makes the first EULA pop up but the second one never appears I can't get to the log in screen
